website_summaries.verdict: High-performance airless paint sprayer with a bit of a learning curve from a respected brand that's ideal for big jobs.
pros: Fast and efficient sprayer that knocks out big jobs fast
With practice, achieving pro-grade results is fairly easy
Long hose and cords provide good mobility
cons: Can clog when using paint with primer

website_summaries.verdict: An excellent pick if you're looking for a balance between weight and performance.
pros: Sturdy, durable, and easy to use
Lightweight paint gun cuts down on user fatigue
Once pressure is adjusted, it provides good coverage and sprays easily
cons: May need to water down thick paints like latex

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I do construction work and bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I do construction work and bought this for when we need to spray. I have sprayed roughly 100 gallon through it with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 15 gallons
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 15 gallons. Cleaned throughly after each use. Tried to use today and would not prime and then the pump would not turn on. Stuck with an entire house masked and ready to spray but not pump!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found it easy to set up this system since the directions are ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no experience with paint sprayers. Yet, I found it easy to set up this system since the directions are good. Cleaning is a bit of a hassle, but it always is after painting. The only thing I did not like: when you have about 2" of paint left in the can (1 gallon or 5 gallon), it looses suction. I absolutely LOVED how quickly I could paint something, and the overspray was minimal. The prep and the clean up take the longest.
customer_reviews.author: B.Wolff

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 1/2 gal of paint on OSB board with good coverage. Yes
customer_reviews.text: I painted my 22'x24' horse barn in 2hrs using 3 1/2 gal of paint on OSB board with good coverage. Yes, the over spray is an issue. I used tape, or piece of cardboard but it's a horse barn so I wasn't upset. I would however, buy an extension wand sprayer if I was doing the house or trim. This is an excellent product for the home owner.
customer_reviews.author: Odediah skolnick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but....
customer_reviews.text: I think it was fairly easy to learn and use. Pros: - The jobs goes very quick once everything is ready - The paint coat is amazing. Used on basement celing rafters, vents, pipes, etc... - Spray gun didn't clog with Sherwyn Williams Super Paint latex based. - Cleanup is rather easy Cons: - Clogged a ton with Sherwyn Williams primer. Like every 30-60 seconds. Brutal - When it clogged, not easy to flip unclogger lever back and forth. I needed a wrench after a point. Would have been 5 aside from primer clogging constantly. Maybe even a 3, but when it works it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cara S.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It makes a huge mess. You have to cover every inch of your home where you do not want paint dust. Very difficult to clean if you want to leave it in very good condition. It took me over an hour to ensure that all of the paint was out of the pump. It doesn't spray evenly - it took 3 coats of paint before the paint looked even due to the heavy lines that it kept spraying. It kept leaving lines all over. I am highly dissatisfied and disappointed. If you want to waste a lot of paint and you are painting a furniture free home... Maybe it's worth trying. Otherwise, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to paint our kitchen cabinets. WOW! Great product and have used to also paint furniture. Recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: BGH

customer_reviews.title: Clean well; buy an additional part
customer_reviews.text: The unit is easy to setup and use. The spray cut-off is sharp so very little taping. I does take time to clean the unit after use (and you will want to clean it well regardless of the time it takes). If you really want to make the unit easier to use buy the swivel unit and place between hose and gun. It will eliminate the need to constantly "fight" the hose trying to control the gun
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied User

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to suse
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those who reads all the negative reviews first to see if there are any trends, so to write a 5 star review means something to me. If you're looking for an incredibly easy sprayer to use, this is it. Cleanup couldn't be simpler. Out of the box and painting in 5 minutes. I purchased several other sprayers, and they either quit working, or clogged. This sprayer has the look and feel of a professional product. I was painting with a water-based enamel, which is on the thinner side, and even with a thinner product, the overspray was very minimal. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. We are building a log home and used this to stain the outside. We put 35 gallons of stain through this product in a 3 day span. (two coats). We used an oil based stain and we had the whole thing cleaned up in 30 minutes. The tip clogged three times during the process and all you need to do is turn the tip around press the trigger and it self unclogs. Not once did we have to stop working. Very pleased with this and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal results with amateur experience and knowledge
customer_reviews.text: Amazing paint sprayer that beats the snot out of my LVLP method with much more even coverage, less mess in filling, easier to clean, and leaves a beautiful coat! With the high quality exterior latex paint (unthinned) it sprayed an amazing result with my amateur experience and YouTube knowledge. I bought this to paint a wooden fence (we opted to paint instead of stain) and I can't wait to try it our! Will be much less cumbersome than HVLP/LVLP spraying! Overspray is definitely more than LVLP, but the benefits greatly outweigh the unavoidable negative (in the case of any spraying).
customer_reviews.author: Bastian

customer_reviews.title: The best for the price hands down if you follow instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: The best for the price hands down if you follow instructions and keep it clean. Sprayed some pretty thick latex through it and 2.5 hrs later the whole house was done. I did change the provided tip out for a 517, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan k#62 Gillihan

customer_reviews.title: Good little sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I was a new construction house painter for years and used Graco sprayers exclusively. I have since gone from strictly painting to doing general contracting on a smaller scale and the X5 is great for what I do. I have two of these and as long as you take care of them with proper flushing and using the pump armor, you'll get years of use out of this thing. As an aside, NEVER loan your paint sprayers out. People are idiots and you'll spend a day doing seal replacements because of this.
customer_reviews.author: ClementsB

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this Item to paint rental properties> it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Item to paint rental properties> it was a big help . It cut down on the amount of time it took me to repaint an entire house. It also cut down on the amount of paint that I had to purchase. Note make sure that you use this prior to putting down your flooring or make sure that you cover your flooring because the paint particles that are cast into the are will cover your floor or anything else that is not covered for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Barber II

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer,  but not for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so let me start with saying this has been a great sprayer. That being said, if you are a "DIYer" and just doing small projects or one room at a time this isn't the one for you. It is a bit of a process setting it up, cleaning, etc. This is definitely more aimed towards painting a whole house or doing all your walls inside in a day. I bought a roller attachment for it and that has been wonderful. I hope all that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome painter. We sprayed the entire house ceilings in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome painter. We sprayed the entire house ceilings in no time. Understand that it is a sprayer so make sure everything is covered well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, well built -  but setup is involved and it uses a lot of paint.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an upgrade to my HomeRight Finish Max. I’ve used it one time and it put the paint on perfectly. No runs, no clogs, superior coverage. The downside it setup is very involved. Using multiple buckets and priming with water first wasn’t expected. Just be aware there’s a learning curve. I’m going to use this only with bigger projects because of the time needed for setup/cleanup. It also sucks through paint like a thirsty camel - so you will probably need more paint than you’re expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great little machine, does a great job
customer_reviews.text: not counting getting familiar with the machine, carefully reading instructions, and doing some test spraying, we painted my 16X24 shop in about 45 minutes. and......that's with two coats. my wife did the spraying, and I moved the machine and wrangled the hose. clean up was not as onerous a chore as I feared it would be.
customer_reviews.author: billy hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Boy am I glad I did
customer_reviews.text: We have all wooden siding and had the daunting task of priming/painting it. I did a lot of research on sprayers and bought this one. Boy am I glad I did. It was easy to use, clean up with pretty easy, and it is compact enough to move around without any problems. I think it was operator error, but the only complaint that I have is the amount of paint that seems to be wasted in the cleaning process. Now again, I'm 98% certain it's operator error, but still. I would recommend to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey R.

customer_reviews.title: Product failed. Order replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few minutes then lost prime and couldnt get it back. Then started working again and finished the room. Then started another project 3 days later and then failed completely. I followed all manufacturers storing and operating procedures. I'm no stranger to airless sprayers. I've ordered a replacement and will see how it works. When it's working it works great. I believe the bypass button failed and wont allow it to build up pressure.
customer_reviews.author: JFlint

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is very nice to have for home projects. It takes a minute to get it primed but the process is very easy. My initial cleaned seemed like it was going to take forever but then I was finished and it didn’t take too long. Keep the nozzle clean and you’ll do just fine. I used Kilz 2 in mine and did not have to thin or anything. It sprayed and covered perfectly. I was very impressed and would recommend this to anyone needing to paint an entire room or lots of pieces (like kitchen cabinets). If used inside you will want to tape everything and cover what you don’t want painted (common sense).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk, Maybe A Lemon?
customer_reviews.text: Product works extremely well when it works. Otherwise it is absolute garbage, a chaotic mess, a paint waster, and waste of time. I've used it a few times now, following the directions each time and have come to the same conclusions. Even if it worked consistantly, it is still a massive mess from the paint dust to cleaning it out. I could see this being amazing if you had an empty house and maybe no carpets if it worked or doesn't clog. I'll give it one more chance one day, but I'm at the point where I would just prefer rollers and brushes as oppose to the messy nightmare and stress.
customer_reviews.author: William Alexander Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but perhaps not for my use-case
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a paint sprayer for furniture. I think this sprayer is made for much larger jobs. I am still trying to figure this machine out, but it puts down a huge amount of paint in a very short amount of time. I went through nearly 4 gallons of paint on a piece I know probably only needed 1 gallon if I hand painted it. It seems easy to clean, but in my experience, paint sprayers just dont get that clean and each subsequent usage gets less and less effective. I like the machine, but I think it is overkill for the small pieces (tables, dressers, bookcases, loft beds, etc.) that I make.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T

customer_reviews.title: Great home unit.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my house with Behr semitransparent stain. I am very happy with the results. Buy a 25 foot hose. The hose with it is not long enough for house painting with out constantly relocating the unit. The only problem I see with the unit is that it throws off a lot of ozone when priming and cleaning. Makes me wonder about durability. I would like to get a comment from Graco about this. Check out before and after shots.
customer_reviews.author: gperkins61

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my basement and decided to jump on the paint sprayer bandwagon and I'm glad I did. I did not want to roll or brush my trim and doors which was the main reason I wanted a sprayer. This worked great. As a first time sprayer user, it took a moment to get familiar with how the machine worked and the technique for spraying. Watched a few videos on both subjects to point me in the right direction and picked it up quick. The machine is pretty straight forward after the first time use and I was delighted by the results.
customer_reviews.author: TateD

customer_reviews.title: Get the attachment for the inject Roller Head it's well worth it and prevent a lot of the spray over
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for years they're really great Little Machines easy to fix if you know how however I will say that if you don't wash it out properly unhook the hose directly up to the machine and turn on the hose and let it push everything through the line then you haven't cleaned it out enough. Now the attachment to have a roller paint arm that it paints with is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nesxica

customer_reviews.title: Saved Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: Decided that a 1000 square feet of drop ceiling was way too costly. The X5 worked flawlessly. Never had a clog. I was scared of the setup and cleanup instructions, but after videos it was game on. Wrestled with stiff hose at times. Loved the X5. Even though I watched all the videos, I climbed the ladder for my first spray and shot myself in the face. I do the dumbest things at times.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Napaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Painted a 2,200 SF house (trim, doors, walls and ceilings) with this bad boy! Worked great with sherwin williams duration paint (latex) and their alkyd enamel (oil based). I will be using again for my next project. You must follow the directions though.
customer_reviews.author: Peeps21

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer, perfect for cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Used this guy on a couple of jobs already. Really quiet in the running state.. the back flush is a little noisy but thats only in the beginning. we did buy an additional sprayer tip to jave the smaller 8" spray fan.. much better for caninets, less over spray. sprays latex like a pro
customer_reviews.author: Gage Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to our paint supplies!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sprayer. Really cuts down painting time. I wasn't sold at first but after I had to do some touch up areas rolling, I realized that the sprayer is much more efficient and quicker. Clean up is a little tricky but if you follow the instructions (which are actually very well written and with diagrams, easy to undersrand) you shouldn't have any problems. This has made painting our renovations much easier.
customer_reviews.author: MDJ

customer_reviews.title: 45 gallons of paint over the weekend - it is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Remodeling our house. Lots of walls, 10ft ceilings to paint. This sprayer made the job so much easier. Great sprayer, easy to clean, easy to use. Strongly recommend. I also bought an 25ft extenstion tube and a 4 foot metal sprayer extension. Made it super easy to get around and not have to move the sprayer and I could reach the ceilings! Easy to clean up and some great videos on youtube to explain how it works. Highly recommend. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: I love this sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I got this to paint the exterior of buildings. It’s good for that. Don’t get this tool if you need to paint your accent wall in the living room with your grandmothers occasional table nearby. It’s not good for that. Get your paint in 5 gallon buckets. Get your building ready to paint. Cover your hair and wear clothes you don’t care about. Then just go nuts. Watch the videos they have about how to use it. They really help.
customer_reviews.author: Schmoo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with this product, it worked very well. However, I would suggest that you build a stable platform for it, so that it would set up high, thats if you are using a 5 gallon paint bucket. I had to sit the sprayer on top of the bucket so that the drain and suction hose would fit perfectly; the sprayer is so light weight, when I moved to maneuver the spray hose the sprayer would constantly come off the bucket, it was a pain.
customer_reviews.author: jerry williams

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer completely stopped pressurizing the hose halfway through the day the 2nd time I used it. It worked perfectly the first time I used it, really liked it while it worked. Followed the provided instructions perfectly to set up, spray, and clean out both times. At some point, halfway through painting my house, the machine stopped pressurizing the hose and ran continuously, spraying out a mist of paint. I tried cleaning it all out, re-priming, everything, but it wouldn't pressurize. Totally worthless sprayer now, had to go purchase a brand new sprayer from my local big box store to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: ... got this because paint rolling the ceiling really really sucks. One coat is not really ideal though so ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this because paint rolling the ceiling really really sucks. One coat is not really ideal though so I usually spray one direction and spray crossway after a few, while saving my arm and time. I'm not sure what to do without this machine. I not only use this for the ceiling but for walls in general and it is great and fast, just be sure to wear a mask because it gets everywhere. It was a learning curve for me at first but that is usually the case with machines you haven't used before. The cleaning is not a fun process, but it gets easier to do after using it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DragonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR HOMEOWNERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made painting my house so easy. I have many health issues (mainly just old) and did not know if I could do it myself. But, this sprayer makes it so very easy. Purchasing this sprayer, paint (top of the line) and a new ladder (safety first) I saved a minimum of $2,000 over paying someone to do it. My suggestion is buy this sprayer, do some test spraying and you will love the outcome and THE SAVINGS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: something wrong with to spray tip guard
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the laminated quick guide for set up. This sprayer came assembled with the gun attached and the spray tip guard attached. The first day I used it I noticed the guard didn't rotate and it was at an odd angle making you hold the gun at an odd angle. It was over tightened and couldn't be removed. I called customer service and they didn't grasp what the problem was, telling me to soak it in warm soapy water. I made two trips to my local paint store and had the manager call also. I ended up getting a whole new gun and spray tip so I could finish the job I started. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Excellant results
customer_reviews.text: Received unit quicker than stated. I am avid DIY. Used this to paint 3 rooms and hallway. Definitely need to put in time to cover and tape everything well. But that time is worth it. The sprayer worked great. Watch the video and read directions to get acclimated to how everything works, very simple once you are accustomed to it. Be careful not to over spray one area (it will cause running of paint) for the first time make sure to have a roller near by just in case. Clean up is super easy and faster than cleaning rolls & brushes.
customer_reviews.author: scott slough

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, love it, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I painted 22 doors with this sprayer, and the doors look amazing/professionally painted. Read the instructions, then, read the instructions again, and again. Also, watch online videos on how to setup, use and clean this sprayer. DON'T try to use it if you have no experience with sprayers. Finally, learn about which spray nozzles work best for the type of paint/stain you are spraying. This is professional equipment, and it will work perfectly IF you learn to use it correctly first. I am super happy with it. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lex_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Makes painting easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to paint the interior walls and ceilings of a fairly large house with up to 25' ceiling height. I'm extremely happy with the results. I've used rollers for years and still use them for small/quick areas when I don't want to deal with cleaning the sprayer, but for bigger jobs the X5 is unbeatable. As stated in many reviews, this thing has a learning curve and you have to have some patience at first. Once you get the hang of it (both for spraying and cleaning), it's a pleasure to use and makes painting far easier.
customer_reviews.author: KevinK

customer_reviews.title: Been Painting for 22 years , It works great!! You just put a 311 graco tip on here and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Been painting for 22 years it works great! Just like the real expensive ones, make sure and push the release button on the side on this from time to time, also all the paint sprayers come with a huge fan tip that puts out a lot of paint and a wide fan , no painter I know likes these 511 tips , do yourself a favor and buy a 311 graco tip to put on this
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Practice a little
customer_reviews.text: Have never used a spray gun before and after reading some reviews; practice a little and you’ll be happy with this machine. Find the right distance and speed on some old plywood or drywall sheets til you get the hang of it. Great for painting rooms, decks, fences. It’s pretty good and painting cabinets and projects, but I prefer my Fuji sprayer for those projects.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mangouranes

customer_reviews.title: Makes painting a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to repaint my house. So far I painted approximately 500 sqft with two coats in under an hour for each coat. Would highly recommend starting on something you don't care about to get the pressure correct. Also would highly recommend breathing protection as there is a moderate amount of overspray. Cover glasses with safety lenses to avoid getting paint dots all over them. Overall, I would highly recommend this model to anyone that is even moderately handy with such things.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Main

customer_reviews.title: Over-spray was very easy to control
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful & effective machine for a homeowner with a large very rough surface to paint. Over-spray was very easy to control. I used what I thought was very thick exterior latex paint and the machine didn't miss a beat. The only thing I didn't like is the instructions left out a very important step in the priming process. I guessed at the solution after only a few minutes however.
customer_reviews.author: John @ Woods

customer_reviews.title: Works great for thick fence paint stain
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old Wagner airless sprayer. Just follow the quick start sheet and you get the sprayer primed and ready to spray. Adjustable spray strength is a great. Used to spray thick stain on wooden fence. Good coverage. Clean-up was much easier than the Wagner but it still takes some time to do.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Rosanova

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I never liked painting but decided to paint the exterior brick on our house (we were quoted $7500.00 to have it done). Because our brick is highly textured using a roller was pretty much out of the question. This thing worked perfectly. I was actually surprised how easy it was. For a first timer I achieved an excellent result. Read the instructions, watch the video, understand that there will always be some overspray, don't be afraid to try it, buy good paint. This unit saved me a pile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Preparation is key!
customer_reviews.text: The power behind this machine was definitely impressive. I did not have to thin exterior paint before painting. The set up and cleaning took a while but preparation is definitely important! The only part that was frustrating was the plastic piece near the tip of the spray gun. If you screw the tip on too tight and try to rotate the top 90 degrees, the plastic piece starts splitting.
customer_reviews.author: abell301

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea, but just not functional for someone that is not a painter!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using a roller. The prepping to paint takes so long that I can roll it faster. Also because I'm a novice I noticed that I ended up using a lot more paint than if using a roller. Great product but more for someone that uses it professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Villazon

customer_reviews.title: Read Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked flawlessly for painting my home's exterior. After reading the directions and a few learning passes on some cardboard, I was ready to refresh the look of my home. It sprayed evenly and turned out great. I cleaned the sprayer after use in accordance with the instructions and put it in storage. A few months later, I needed to use it and it worked just as it did now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon E.

customer_reviews.title: Decent machine, hose is extremely stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with the gun dripping during spraying despite trying all the adjustments. Not too happy with how stiff the hose is, I bought a roller attachment and the hose is so awkward and stiff it makes it difficult to manage. Similar to a pressure washer hose or air hose their are different types of rubber depending on the quality. If this hose was more flexible I would rate the package 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Holdings

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all after calling tech support,was told it's do not have the power for exterior paint
customer_reviews.text: Unable to paint exterior paint according to tech support.bought mine last spring but didn't try it out before today. We screened the paint diluted it with water called the company after trying all their suggestions.paint comes out as long as we don't use the nozzle
customer_reviews.author: K. Butler

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to spray Killz and latex paints. Worked great! Adjustable Psi allows very good coverage control. Easy to clean with mineral spirits. Long hose and power cords give you freedom of movement to do a good size room.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great product terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for this are absolutely garbage. Terribly written and shown. Watch videos on the website or YouTube. Once you know how to use it, this thing is amazing. It does use a lot of paint but I guess that’s the downside of a sprayer. It does take some practice to get a good flow going but once you have it down it’s so smooth. Clean up is not terrible, I didn’t have a hose or I’m guessing it may have been easier to use the attachment. I’ve used it once and I’m loving this. Totally worth the cost (maybe more).
customer_reviews.author: rsal

customer_reviews.title: Huge time saver
customer_reviews.text: I have cedar fence around my entire property. I painted both sides of the entire fence in two work days by myself. The sprayer never clogged and the paint was applied evenly and consistently. The time saved finishing this project was huge versus using rollers or brushes. Cleanup took me about an hour. We plan on using this to paint our house next. Excellent product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great results
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and super intuitive to operate. It made quick work on an indoor painting project and I plan on using it for some more projects in the near future. I was surprised how quiet it was overall (it only makes noise when you squeeze the trigger).
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Behr Premium Plus will clog it like a roll of toilet paper in the toilet bowl
customer_reviews.text: Solid enough. Learned that paint that has primer in it is too thick to run through this machine though....Behr Premium Plus will clog it like a roll of toilet paper in the toilet bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Expect a huge learning curve...
customer_reviews.text: Bought over a month ago and spent the entire day trying to troubleshoot multiple issues. AWFUL. Not user friendly at all, the steps it takes to start and clean this thing is a joke. I have a masters degree and several years of construction under my belt. This is just downright unusable. Wish I had tried it earlier when I could return it. Update: I now have this working and it’s been very useful. Still not a fan of setup and clean up but the actual painting does really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I do handyman work and paint quite a bit as part of that. So far I’ve been happy with it. I’ve put about 30 gallons through it so far. Easy to take apart for cleaning. Good quality finish using the included tip. I purchased the warranty amazon offered so hopefully it will be a sprayer I own for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, this is a great sprayer. I used it several times and what a time saver. It is easy to use and clean. Reade instructions carefully and work with water to get the hang of it. Keep the spray tip clean and wash thoroughly after use. That is where you can run into plugging issues if not. I highly recommend this sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: gkk2001

customer_reviews.title: great little sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this sprayer, for the price. I bought it for small jobs around the house like the outside of my garage and the drop ceiling in my basement.it worked better than I expected for the price of the machine.it's very light weight very portable and easy to use and cleaning is a little messy but very easy . I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This is like using a never-ending can of spray paint. I painted my garage with it and we timed how quickly this works. I was able to paint an 8x8 wall in 3 minutes. No cutting, no rolling, just spraying. We will be using this to stain our fence next and then I'm painting all of my cabinets. There is definitely a good amount of overspray so prep your area well and wear a lot of gear. There will be paint dust everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Justice Talbot

customer_reviews.title: A must for homeowners
customer_reviews.text: A bit of work to set up and clean but this thing is the bomb. So fast to paint with. Cuts hours off your time plus no cramps in your wrist or shoulders from hours of brush painting. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: chops26

customer_reviews.title: Read the Quick Guide before you start
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spray 500' of cedar fence, 1262, 6" boards. I did buy the recommended smaller tip for transparent stain and a 50' hose to go with the hose provided. I used the quick start guide to prime the sprayer and got started. Worked amazing. On the inside of my fence with just the plain boards I was finished in 6 hours and used 18 gallons of transparent water based stain. The quick tip is easy to use, clears fast. Easy to clean up. Dropped the suction tube into a 5 gallon bucket and started spraying. I have several projects to us this on. Make your life easier and get this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrdoug1957

customer_reviews.title: We did get the roller attachment which we love for big painting projects
customer_reviews.text: The spraying has quite a learning curve. We have decided to only use the spray portion outdoors. We did get the roller attachment which we love for big painting projects. Does take quite a bit of time to clean after use but overall a good investment and time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Kass2229

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a homeowner and like to work on your own house -- even if it includes painting... This is the tool you should buy. Even if you use it once every couple of years, it is worth it. ($300 bucks? Come on, you spend more on coffee in a year) Don't let the prime and clean up procedures scare you away. It is easy and makes complete sense after a couple of procedures. Don't get me wrong, you'll still need your brush and roller, but this incredible device will lay down more acrylic in 10 minutes than you can drip and spill in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Lift

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's my first experience with any kind of painter. All I can say is that it painted 3000sq feet home with no trouble. The key is to go through the steps to keep it clean when you finish using it. If you can do that, then you'll enjoy this sprayer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully and was very easy to set up. Be prepared to spend some time cleaning it and buy an extra bottle of pump armor when you purchase this. I love it and have used it on trim, doors, ceilings and walls. Great results and worth the money for time saved
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Significant process to prime and clean. Messy until you ...
customer_reviews.text: Significant process to prime and clean. Messy until you learn the process. Once primed it performed very well to paint a wrought iron fence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sprayer. As other reviewers mentioned, it really helps to watch the videos and be sure you know what you need to do before you start! It's not difficult, but is definitely a few steps to set up, prime, spray, and clean/store. I love that you can use the garden hose to clean it. So easy!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! You'll be so happy you did!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine. We decided to refinish our fence and thought spraying it was the most efficient way. It was a little daunting setting up the first time, but the spraying was AWESOME! I finished the fence in about 45 minutes!! This is the best purchase I've made in a long time, I cant wait to paint the house!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Beauchaine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for non-professional use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good device for light to medium use. It handles latex primer and paint without needing thinning. Read all the instructions and other purchasers comments before using it to avoid unfortunate accidents/incidents. Be sure to tighten all hoses and connections very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Airless Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: First, this sprayer is made in the USA. Came timely, and with all parts neatly labeled and bagged. Super easy to setup with only the setup guide. Had it painting within the hour! Started with my beloved shed, and it came out fabulous. The X5 turned out to be exactly what I need. Next, on to the house!!!! Super easy to use, and even clean for storing till the next project. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: nn

customer_reviews.title: this thing is slick
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and makes quick work of any painting job. Once I had taped off all the windows and things I didn't want painted, I was able to do the entire outside of my house in an hour or two (I wasn't really keeping track of time). The result was a good looking well covered paint job
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Finished my Basement in 1/10 of the Time
customer_reviews.text: Just wow. Every once in a while you buy a tool and scratch your head asking why didn’t I buy this before? This is such a tool. Easy to use. Didn’t require paint thinning. I painted the entire 900sf basement in a few hours. Such a time saver. Next up, stain the fences.
customer_reviews.author: RealProductReview

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Over 300 feet of wooden fence stained in about 3 hours. That would have taken me days with a roller and brush. Worked well right out of the box. Setup and startup instructions are very good. Cleanup instructions are very confusing, at least to me. Recommended watching videos on YouTube prior to using.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Matches the high ratings
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer came highly rated. After using it to paint a large shed (14 x 28), I totally agree. The pressure control saves a lot of paint. Do note with a hose extension you will use about 1/4 gal of paint before it comes out of the sprayer head. Easy to start and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This was a godsend
customer_reviews.text: I hate painting. This sprayer made repainting my foundation a breeze. Setting it up for use and cleaning it after were a little involved than I thought they'd be but it's definitely worth it. I got very good results even though I'd never used a paint sprayer before. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KWest

customer_reviews.title: read the instruction and you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: awesome is all i can say. must read the instructions for operating and read the instructions for cleaning it. good quality. very happy with the purchase, would definitely recommend. made painting the entire inside of the house easy.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkins4sale

customer_reviews.title: Great tool after the learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! There is definitely a learning curve but once you get it down, every big paint project is a snap. Have patients with the clean up the first time round and READ ALL THE INSTRUCTIONS. Easier with two people, one to spray and one to man the paint bucket. Also, take caution not to hold the handle the wrong way and spray yourself in the face, which I did... Twice.
customer_reviews.author: K80R

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy refurbished
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sprayer refurbished. NEVER AGAIN! The first day we used it, it kept cutting off. We cleaned it and waited a day to use. The second day it lasted about three minutes and then stopped working completely. Buy new!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for us. We used it to paint the exterior of our house. Sprayed over 4 days. Never had any issues. We called support once because we had to turn our house power off to paint near power lines and tried to use our truck outlet to power it, and it wasn't working. Support was very helpful and told us if the plug wasnt lit up it wasnt getting enough power (which is wasn't).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home dyi
customer_reviews.text: Used it to spray tint able primer in a garage with popcorn ceiling. Watered it down a little covered well and ceiling didn’t fall off. Win win for us. Now have a sprayer to repaint steel siding on the house next summer
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not what I need
customer_reviews.text: I paint apartments 2-3 a day and figured it would be easier to move around quicker with but it just does not have the power to keep up or extra things that help carry hose and gun around with over good but if u use the machine a lot like me go with at least a x7
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Anderson INC

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! We are remodeling and was able to spray my ceilings, walls, and ever paint my cabinets with this sprayer. I had to purchase a longer hose to do my vaulter ceilings, but am very happy with the results!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Bought originally from amazon and the priming pump was broke. Amazon was great about returning it. Eventually ended up buying from HD because I needed it quickly. I have used it several times now (Ceilings, furniture and crown). There is a definite learning curve. I found it best for my crown. When painting my ceilings I had trouble not getting lap marks. Eventually just ended up back rolling them. Still saved time though. People complain about cleaning, but I didn't find it overly burdensome. For long term storage there is a solution that you have to buy. The stuff from Graco is overpriced and I ended up buying a concentrate from Titan that was much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to paint our super long back yard wall. Using a paint roller would take forever. Very pleased overall with the ease and control of the spray. Using the sprayer took a fraction of the time that a paint roller would. It is a bit pricy, but still cheaper than what a professional painter would have charged. And now we have this handy tool for future projects :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless walls and ceilings
customer_reviews.text: Primed all of our walls and painted our ceilings with this sprayer! It works so well and doesn’t leave any brush or roller marks! Changing colors and cleaning is a process but overall it saves so much time compared to rolling!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie P

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient
customer_reviews.text: I was able to paint the exterior of a 1700 square foot house in a day. It was pretty easy to set up and the clean up was very manageable as well. I'm going to try painting interior doors next. Should be fun...
customer_reviews.author: Red Matador

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Fantastic sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality paint sprayer. I've used many sprayers much more expensive than this one. The Graco X5 sprayer delivers the same results as a $1,000 unit. I can't attest to ultimate longevity, but I sprayed the exterior of my house and expect that it will work as new next time I need to use it. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: A lot of downtime with maintenance. Stick to rolling.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of a sprayer but at this point I have spent more time troubleshooting than painting. Following start up steps, get all primed, and then bring on the paint. A few strokes in the motor kicks on and I’m out of action. Troubleshooting is an absolute mess when you have it primed with paint. Definitely going back to rolling and will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Held

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on a mission trip with my church. I have used an airless sprayer before. I read the instructions ( I usually dont) . I assembled it on the trip, and spayed 15 gallons of latex paint in about 5 hrs. This time includes taping windows and up/down a ladder. The clean up was very easy with the included hose attachment. I recommend a small wire brush also.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it once and it painted the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once and it painted the room i wanted to paint in under 5 minutes. But it did take me about an hour to tape avereything else to avoid getting them painted. I have a 2800 sq ft home and im sure ill be able to paint it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Sin in law is a professional painter. He said this works just as good as his larger sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: So far my son in law has only used it once but He loves how it worked for him. His last sprayer was larger and he said this works just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and use. The instructions were easy to follow. Cleanup takes awhile but it wasn’t that hard to do it just depends how clean you want it. You won’t get every drop of paint from the bottom on the bucket but it Is much faster than using brush and roller.
customer_reviews.author: bigspender

customer_reviews.title: Best DIY sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Painted a small bathroom in less than 10 min and spent about 30 min taping and covering shower glass with plastic. So worth it and I won't be sore tomorrow! Took maybe 10 min or less to clean out and it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer barnes

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to fully understand the spray and prime functions and purposes by studying the instructions, and there will be no issues with use and cleaning. The spray gun works great at all angles. Recommend using 5-gallon containers of paint to make the job easier on yourself and faster even if you don't use all of the paint.
customer_reviews.author: DonH

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I initially reviewed this as 1 star but it was user error. I tried using a primer that was too thick and it clogged the filter in the handle of the sprayer. While I had to roll out my primer, the paint I used sprayed easy and without a hitch. Finished my whole project in 2 hours including setup and cleaning/storage. It's a great sprayer, just beware of using thick materials like Sheetrock primer
customer_reviews.author: D. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Happy with sprayer for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: The prep time (scraping, taping, etc) was over a week, but the actually spraying of my 900 sq foot cabin only took a half day with this sprayer. If my walls were smooth, I probably would have saved time with rollers - but there's no way the rough surface of my concrete home would look as great as they do with spraying. I watched the instructional video twice and took notes before operating - there's definitely a learning curve. Be sure to heed the warning of wearing eye protection - upon first use I had the handle reversed and nearly sprayed myself in the face - the high pressure can penetrate skin, eyes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: RCR

customer_reviews.title: I made my life easy
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say it's an airless paint sprayer on Amazon The Price is Right and saved me hours of rolling out paint spray the room in about 15-20 minutes moved on to the next had my whole house 2900sf primed in one day a local painter wanted $2,100 I spent probably $500 in paint and about 250 bucks on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lemke

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since chocolate ice cream !!
customer_reviews.text: Used the Graco Magnum X5 to prime & paint my 2 story stucco house. It worked flawlessly. No clogs, relatively easy to clean compared with other airless sprayers I’ve used. Follow the simple laminated instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Genuine Feedbac

product_meta.title: Graco Magnum 262800 X5 Stand Airless Paint Sprayer
product_meta.description:
Style:Magnum X5 Airless Paint SprayerThe Graco Project Series sprayers make it easy for avid DIY homeowners and handymen to power through small to midsize jobs with speed and finesse. DIY homeowners and handymen get cost-efficient, high-speed performance with the Magnum X5. These sprayers are ideal for painting all types of indoor projects, or tackle outdoor projects like decks, siding, fences or small homes. Includes SG2 Metal Spray Gun, RAC IV 515 Switch Tip, 25 ft. Duraflex paint hose, Pump Armor storage fluid, PowerFlush adapter, Quick Start-Up Guide and Operation Manual. Fluid Outlet Size (in): 1/4.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Graco - The Brand Preferred by Pros. Whether you’re a weekend warrior, a serious DIY enthusiast, a handyman or remodeling contractor, or a painting professional, Graco makes the ideal airless spraying equipment to meet your needs. Whether you are just starting out or moving up, choose the Magnum or Graco model to help you handle your job with ease. No matter what you're painting—entire homes, rooms, decks or fences—Graco has you covered!
feature_bullets: CONTROL PAINT FLOW: Fully adjustable pressure to give you ultimate control of paint flow for any project size
SPRAY PAINT UNTHINNED: Stainless Steel Piston Pump allows you to spray paint unthinned at high pressure
SPRAY DIRECTLY FROM PAINT BUCKET: Flexible suction tube allows you to spray directly from a 1 or 5 gallon paint bucket
FAST AND EASY CLEAN-UP: Power Flush Adapter connects to a garden hose for fast and easy cleaning
IDEAL FOR INDOOR AND OUTDOOR PROJECTS: Can support up to 75 ft. of paint hose giving you extra reach for your projects
CONTINUOUS SPRAYING: RAC IV Switch Tip allows you to reverse the tip when clogged to keep you spraying
SPRAY MORE PROJECTS EACH YEAR: Annual use recommendation is up to 125 gallons per year

specifications.Included Components: SG2 Metal Spray Gun, RAC IV 515 SwitchTip, 25 ft. Duraflex paint hose, Pump Armor storage fluid, PowerFlush adapter, Quick Start-Up Guide and Operation Manual
specifications.Warranty Description: One year warranty against manufacturer defect
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,303 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
